description: This file is a C header file defining utility functions and macros for LAN management within the CCSP (Cisco Common Software Platform) components. It includes functions for MAC address derivation from IPv6 addresses and a utility for cloning copy operations.

methods.name: LanManager_ParamValueChanged
methods.description: Handles the event when a parameter's value changes. It's used for managing parameter updates within the LAN manager context.

methods.name: LanManager_GetMACAddrFromIPv6Addr
methods.description: Derives the MAC address from an IPv6 address following RFC4291. If the interface ID isn't derived from the MAC, it returns the interface ID.

methods.name: LanManager_GetMACAddrFromIPv6LinkLocalAddr
methods.description: Derives the MAC address from an IPv6 link-local address, validating address format as per RFC4291. Returns NULL if the address isn't link-local.

methods.name: LanManager_CheckCloneCopy
methods.description: Performs a clone copy operation for strings, allocating memory for the destination and copying the source string.
